test-case.description: Should create proper log entries with timestamps
test-case.name: CoreApp Non-Interactive Mode.Logging and Output Verification.Should create proper log entries with timestamps

failure.message: Expected regular expression '\[INFO\]' to match '[2025-06-19 20:12:57.897] [SUCCESS] [Initialize-Loggin...] Logging system initialized [2025-06-19 20:12:57.973] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Core runner started [2025-06-19 20:12:57.977] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Loading configuration from: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation/core-runner/core_app/default-config.json [2025-06-19 20:12:57.984] [SUCCESS] [core-runner.ps1 ] Starting OpenTofu Lab Automation Core Runner [2025-06-19 20:12:57.986] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Repository root: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation [2025-06-19 20:12:57.988] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Configuration file: /workspaces/opentofu-lab-automation/core-runner/core_app/default-config.json [2025-06-19 20:12:57.990] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Verbosity level: detailed [2025-06-19 20:12:57.999] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Found 38 scripts [2025-06-19 20:12:58.001] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Non-interactive mode: use -Scripts parameter to specify which scripts to run, or -Auto for all scripts [2025-06-19 20:12:58.003] [WARN ] [core-runner.ps1 ] No scripts specified for non-interactive execution [2025-06-19 20:12:58.006] [INFO ] [core-runner.ps1 ] Consider using -Auto to run all scripts, or -Scripts to specify particular scripts [2025-06-19 20:12:58.008] [SUCCESS] [core-runner.ps1 ] Core runner completed successfully', but it did not match.
